title: 33 Preseason Questions — Can’t Tank With Tyrod, the Patriots' Weakness, and Luck Too Late? (Ep. 128)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark continue answering 33 Preseason Questions leading up to opening day. Topics include whether the Bills should trade Tyrod Taylor (05:00) and the increasingly crowded Jameis Winston and Marcus Mariota bandwagons (18:00). Then the guys award Earl Thomas with some retroactive MVP awards (27:30) and consider a Patriots weakness that could affect their playoff run (33:30). Finally, Robert and Kevin explain why Cam Newton and Andrew Luck had better be on the field in Week 1 (37:00) and why the Broncos might be in big trouble (41:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
